sections.heading: name; service of process.The corporate name of each city of the primary class shall be The City of
sections.text: ............ . All process affecting any such city shall be served in the manner provided for service of a summons in a civil action.SourceLaws 1901, c. 16, ยง 7, p. 73;R.S.1913, ยง 4410;C.S.1922, ยง 378
